items.title: 1941 Frozen Front
items.description: Help Russia or Germany to defeat the other in 1941 Frozen Front, a new turn-based war game. Combat the enemy with tanks and infantry. Good luck!

items.title: 3D Sandbox: Battle of the Kingdoms
items.description: 3D Sandbox: Battle of the Kingdoms is an action simulation game where you have complete control over the rise and fall of kingdoms! Build empires, unleash mighty armies, and wield the forces of nature to alter history. Will you guide civilizations to prosperity or watch them crumble in war? The choice is yours!

items.title: Against Zombies
items.description: Against Zombies is an action-packed 3D shooter that thrusts you into a perilous journey through a world overrun by zombies. Battle hordes of the most fearsome undead while defending your last hope for escape - a getaway car. Face the apocalypse head-on in this thrilling game of survival.

items.title: Age Of Arms
items.description: Age of Arms is a strategic defense game where you battle through different eras. Set your weapons in the enemy’s path, defeat foes, and evolve into stronger warriors in each age. With every victory, upgrade your arsenal and keep advancing to become the ultimate warrior of history’s greatest battles.

items.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
items.description: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War is an action tower defense battle game where you fight your opponent throughout the ages, starting from the Stone Age, making your way all the way to modern marvels. Your main task is strategically dominating the battlefield to constantly upgrade your army and conquer enemies in an epic 1v1 battle. Lead your army to victory in this strategic game and show your earned skills to the modern world.

items.title: Age Of War
items.description: Age of War is an action base defense game where you fight a continuous war. Keep creating units to protect your base and destroy the enemy. When you earn enough XP, your civilization will evolve through the ages, offering new technologies to utilize in combat.

items.title: Air Battle Royale: Sky Blitz
items.description: Air Battle Royale: Sky Blitz is an airplane shooting game where you take command of a heavily armed fighter jet. With just a single finger, you'll effortlessly soar through the skies, hunting down rivals and locking onto targets for intense dogfights. Win battles, earn rewards, and amp up your aircraft's speed and firepower or unlock even mightier planes. So, gear up, pilot – ascend to the skies and reign supreme as the ultimate ace in this high-flying extravaganza!

items.title: Air Strike
items.description: Air Strike is a strategic rocket warfare game where you need to destroy all your enemies. Navigate two challenging stages of gameplay. In Stage 1, take control of a powerful rocket and strategically target personal stockpiles and enemies. Stage 2 puts you in command of an elite squad, tasked with eliminating all opposition. Engage in intense battles with tanks, helicopters, and more. With realistic 3D graphics, experience lifelike battles and explosive combat. Your mission's success relies on your tactical prowess. Prepare for victory, commander!

items.title: Fury Foot
items.description: Anger Foot 3D is an action-packed game where your foot becomes your ultimate weapon. Foot fights through challenging rooms to defeat enemies and unlock powerful weapons. You can customize your foot fighter for even more fast-paced combat and immerse yourself in a vibrant world with a high-energy soundtrack. Kick your way to victory in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!

items.title: Ant Colony: New War
items.description: Ant Colony: New War is an action clicker idle game where you are tasked to grow an ant colony. What fun! Explore a vast array of territories and engage in fierce battles with rival colonies as you strive for total dominance. Gather valuable resources to strengthen your forces and challenge other players in intense PvP combat. Strategically build and expand your colony, assembling the ultimate ant army capable of conquering any opposition.

items.title: Archer Defense
items.description: Archer Defense is an action game where you play as an archer defending your position against waves of enemies. You start with a basic bow, but you can upgrade it over time and use different power-ups like bomb, multi-shot, and freeze arrows. You can also set up defenses like sentries and barbed wires to help you fend off the enemy waves. The game features daily rewards, loot boxes to obtain new and powerful bows, and multiple levels of increasing difficulty. Can you defend your position against the enemy onslaught and emerge victorious?

items.title: Archer Master 3D: Castle Defense
items.description: Archer Master 3D: Castle Defence is a cool defensive game in which you are the last person standing to defend the castle! Most of the inhabitants have abandoned you, and the rest have never fought at all.

items.title: Archer Ragdoll Masters
items.description: Archer Ragdoll Masters is a stickman archery action game with ragdoll physics. Line up your arrow and shoot your enemies down one by one. Pick up power-ups and equip new items to your stick archer to own the enemy with greater precision and power.

items.title: Archer Shooter 3D
items.description: Archer Shooter 3D is a thrilling archery game where precision and strategy are key to survival! Take aim, shoot down enemies, and rescue civilians using a limited number of arrows. Every shot counts! Miss too often, and it’s game over. Master your aim, time your shots, and clear each level with skill and focus.

items.title: Archers Arena
items.description: Archers Arena is an exhilarating mix of action and skills that tests your precision, decision-making, and adaptability. It’s designed to provide a challenging and adrenaline-filled experience for players who thrive on competition and enjoy mastering their skills. This game promises a dynamic gameplay experience that blends skill progression, tactical combat, and exciting visuals, making it a must-play for fans of action games.

items.title: Assassin Hero
items.description: Assassin Hero is a roguelike action game that immerses you in the secretive world of the Assassin Brotherhood. Traverse perilous landscapes, from ancient Egypt to medieval cities, Valhalla's hills, and the feudal Orient. Confront classic foes like Templars, pirates, murderers, and mythical creatures. Brace for epic battles against formidable bosses as you relentlessly pursue legendary assassin status. Refine your hit-and-run skills, endure unrelenting enemy hordes, and etch your legacy in Valhalla.

items.title: Attack of the Dead
items.description: Attack of the Dead is an action game where you must kill the hordes of zombies who are coming to you. You'll face an unrelenting onslaught of the undead, hungry to feast on the last remaining survivors. Prepare for an endless battle and prove your survival skills in this gripping game! Become a true hero and the last pillar of humanity and fight against the horrifying zombie threat!

items.title: Auto Ninja
items.description: Auto Ninja is a platformer that challenges you to conquer 41 trap-filled chambers using quick reflexes and sharp thinking. You’ll leap over spikes, dodge deadly obstacles, and solve puzzles as you race to the top. Collect every coin, master each floor, and prove you’ve got the skill to survive the entire tower.

items.title: Autogun Heroes
items.description: Autogun Heroes is an action arcade platformer game that throws you into the heart of an alien-infested battleground alongside a team of fearless heroes. Armed with overloaded weapons and the ability to stack endless upgrades, you’ll blast through relentless waves of enemies in a vivid, fast-paced world teeming with chaos. Every step forward demands sharp strategy, quick reflexes, and the right gear to overpower the alien onslaught. Whether you’re unleashing devastating firepower, unlocking new abilities, or leading your squad into battle, the fight to reclaim your home is as intense as it is exhilarating.

items.title: AutoRPG Arena
items.description: AutoRPG Arena is a turn-based auto-battler RPG where every choice influences the fight. Collect powerful items, upgrade your heroes, and strategize to dominate the battlefield. With each battle, you refine your tactics and strengthen your team, ensuring no two encounters are the same. Victory depends on how well you adapt and optimize your squad.

items.title: Ave Castle
items.description: Ave Castle is a defense game where you take on the role of defense commander and must protect your castle using your strategy. Plant and cut down trees to get money. Use the money to hire new fighters and upgrade your army using wood. Destroy the enemy's castle, use rage skills during the heat of battle, and gain victory! You can also create your own maps and share them through the editor. Play with a friend by using the advanced settings in the menu. The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy's castle.

items.title: Bad Egg
items.description: Bad Egg is an action game where you play as one little egg who needs to survive and kill the zombie chicken army! Collect the eggs and upgrade yourself to become stronger. Hold on until the chopper picks you up. Get to the chopper, or you're clucked. Try to reach the top of the leaderboard! This is a free-range frenzy of arcade action from the yolked-up eggheads behind Shell Shockers. t

items.title: Bash Arena
items.description: Bash Arena is an explosive fusion of Reverse Bullet Hell and Top-down Action genres set in a thrilling power fantasy world. Forget about saving princesses and embrace the endless battles for power, gold, and glory! Engage in furious and dynamic action, face 20 nerve-wracking waves, encounter a variety of enemies, and unlock over 20 upgrades to suit your play style. With global progression, powerful allies, and stunning pixel graphics, it's time to destroy, survive, and prove yourself as the ultimate champion to the crowd and the hordes of darkness!

items.title: Battalion Commander
items.description: Battalion Commander is a top-down shooter game to complete different missions. Control your hero soldier while he builds an army with allies and picks up money and experience points. Use skills when you are about to die and in need of help. It's wartime!

items.title: Battalion Commander 1917
items.description: Battalion Commander 1917 is an action shooting game with World War I theme. Cross over into enemy territory to find an enormous enemy machine and destroy it. Free the fellow soldiers that are captive on the enemy territory and let them join you in the mission. Collect gold to buy valuable upgrades including a heavy tank!

items.title: Battalion Commander 2
items.description: Battalion Commander 2 is an action shooting game where you must shoot your enemy and survive till the end of the stage to win the game. Complete all the missions and save your friends that are being captured by your enemy. Recruit them to help you in the battle. Good luck, soldier!

items.title: Battle Arena Race to Win
items.description: Battle Arena Race to Win is a high-octane arena game where you join the Red or Blue team and engage in fierce car battles. Choose from a variety of cars, collect and upgrade them to dominate the arena. Balance speed, durability, and acceleration to outmaneuver opponents. Equip your car with strategic items, upgrade for success, and climb the leaderboard to lead your team to victory!

items.title: Battle for the Galaxy
items.description: Battle for the Galaxy is a cross-platform MMOstrategygame set in space. Taking inspiration from the most celebrated sci-fi RTS games, you must build and expand your base and military force powerful enough to attack enemies, loot resources, defend your base, and earn medals. With immersive 3D visuals and great music, it's an excellent choice for free browser-based gaming.

items.title: Battle Island
items.description: Battle Island is an action game where you play as a monster trainer who wants to be the master of the island by beating all the other trainers! Battle with wild monsters, challenge the other trainers, earn money frombattles, and use the money to build an army of powerful monsters!

items.title: Battle Masters
items.description: Battle Masters is a fighting game that lets you duke it out with 3 other fighters in awesome one-on-one matches to the death! The game plays in a rock-paper-scissors format - each turn, both of you will choose a hand, and the winner gets a chance to select an action from a list of commands. The winner can choose to either attack, use a skill, use an item, or wait. You'll keep doing this until either one has lost all of their HP. Choose your fighter and may luck be on your side!

items.title: BattleChonk
items.description: BattleChonk is a charming defense game where you guide adorable creatures in their fight against the mischievous Gloomps. You’ll boost your dice, unleash clever attacks, and guard your town with growing strength. As challenges increase, you unlock new Chonks and upgrades, keeping every chapter fresh, strategic, and full of delightful surprises.

items.title: Battlecruisers
items.description: Battlecruisers is a high-intensity strategy game set in a robot-controlled world after humanity’s disappearance. Command a stolen Battlecruiser, build autonomous weapons, and outmaneuver powerful enemy fleets. Progress through a gripping story with 40 levels or test your tactical prowess in endless battles. Upgrade your arsenal, unlock devastating firepower, and master the art of robotic warfare!

items.title: Battleship
items.description: Battleship is a classic two-player naval strategy game that you can play for free in your web browser. You are the commanding officer of an elite fleet of battleships at war with an equally capable enemy. Take turns to fire on your opponent's territory using an array of ranged weaponry.

items.title: Bear Haven
items.description: Bear Haven is a horror game where you need to survive the night from the scary bear. You are a new part-time electrician in Bear Haven Motel who get a night shift job. There's a lack of guests at this time and also there are some strange problems with the electrical system at night, make sure you'll manage to fix them all before 6 AM or you'll be fired. But beware of the bear! Hide and turn off the light if you see one of them. Don't let the bear get you!

items.title: Blocky Tank 3D
items.description: Blocky Tank 3D is an exciting 3D game where you command powerful blocky tanks to battle zombies, spiders, and mutant bosses. An evil wizard has turned villagers into zombies and unleashed an army of monsters to take over the world. Starting as a noob, you must fight through action-packed battles, upgrade your tank, and rise through the ranks to stop this dark force.

items.title: Bloons Tower Defense 3
items.description: Bloons Tower Defense 3 is a tower defense game where you can place monkeys, pineapple bombs, needles, etc., to pop the balloons. Unlock new tracks and choose between 3 difficulty modes to achieve that total bloon popping satisfaction.

items.title: Bloons Tower Defense 4 Expansion
items.description: Bloons Tower Defense 4 Expansion is a fun endless tower defense game. Strategically place your monkey towers along the path to pop all the balloons and defend your territory. With new maps, towers, and upgrades, test your skills and find the best strategies to stop the relentless balloon invasion. Unlock powerful special abilities and unleash devastating attacks to overcome the toughest waves. Can you conquer the expanded challenges and emerge as the ultimate bloons-popping champion?

items.title: Bomber Friends
items.description: Taking inspiration from theclassic Bomberman games, Bomber Friends allows you to take control of your character and work through a series of levels using a combination of skill and logic. During each level, you must find a suitable path through the maze and blast apart the obstructing blocks using your bombs. Before you can reach the exit, you must find a key to unlock the final door, and defeat opponents who block your path.

items.title: Bomber XXL
items.description: Bomber XXL is an arcade action game where you control your airplane in the sky and survive your enemy's attack. Become a fearless pilot in a world filled with planes and bombers. Soar through the skies, and aim to get a high score!

items.title: Bomboo: Endless Bombing Fun
items.description: Bomboo: Endless Bombing Fun is an explosive Bomberman-style adventure where quirky ghost heroes take on slimes in endlessly challenging levels. Strategically plant bombs, smash obstacles, and grab powerful upgrades like speed boosts and remote blasts. Unlock colorful characters and themes as you spin for coins and conquer the chaos in this fast-paced, ghostly blast fest.

items.title: Boom Slingers ReBoom
items.description: Boom Slingers ReBoom is a wild 1v1 multiplayer showdown filled with explosive weapons, quirky characters, and chaotic physics. Face off against real players worldwide in fast-paced turn-based battles using lasers, grenades, bats, and more. Unlock over 50 heroes, master bullet-time trick shots, and sling your way to victory in this action-packed, style-rich arena.

items.title: Boom!
items.description: Boom! is a retro-inspired, turn-based blast fest where every duel is a test of wits and chaos. Unleash bizarre weapons like fart beans and teleport balls to outsmart rivals and reshape destructible arenas. Pick from over 250 quirky fighters, conquer 150+ battlefields, and climb the ranks solo or with friends in unpredictable, explosive showdowns.

items.title: BoomCraft
items.description: BoomCraft is a 2-player TNT game where you defeat your friend and become the survivor. With 4 different maps fight against your friend and make tactics!

items.title: Bot Bumper
items.description: Bot Bumper is an arcade action game where you'll take on the role of a feisty minibot in a futuristic arena teeming with rival minibots. In this adrenaline-fueled arcade action game, your objective is clear: outmaneuver, outwit, and outlast your opponents by strategically pushing them out of the arena or annihilating them with calculated collisions. Are you ready to prove your dominance in the arena? Strap in, rev your engines, and get ready to bump your way to victory in Bot Bumper!

items.title: Bounce Out
items.description: Bounce Out is a casual game where you play as a monster who must eat all the humans in the area. Play by dragging and aiming toward the enemies. Each enemy will give you lore force, and every single enemy will be more powerful the further you go. So be careful and choose whom to eat first.

items.title: Brawl Frenzy: Fight.io
items.description: Brawl Frenzy: Fight.io is a wrestling game where you must defeat all opponents in the arena. Use any tricks, even illegal moves like jumping at your opponent from the corner of the arena. Fight in the city, football field, sea, and even on a skyscraper. Watch the opponent fly away and be the last one standing!

items.title: Brawl Hero
items.description: Brawl Hero is an action game where you take charge of a heroic character to throw balls at enemies. Avoid enemies' attacks, defeat all of the enemies, and level up yourself! Venture to the town, where you can chop wood, excavate stones, or mine gems. Trade these materials with the Wandering Trader for powerups. Gather coins along your journey and exchange them for many thrilling upgrades.

items.title: Bro Royale
items.description: Bro Royale is an action battle game that takes shooting to the next level, blending heart-pounding survivor action with fierce PvP showdowns. Get ready for electrifying arena battles where every move matters, and the chaos keeps you on your toes. Whether you’re going solo in the adrenaline-pumping "1 vs All" mode or teaming up for high-stakes "2 vs 2" brawls, this game delivers non-stop action. Unleash your bro force, master tactical gameplay, and lead your clan to glory in multiplayer shootouts and epic team fights. It's your mission to reclaim the arena from the grip of mayhem—courage is everything.

items.title: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion
items.description: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion is a horde survival action game where you fly on a magic broom and survive in battle against tons of enemies! Defeat enemies and collect experience points. Level up and become stronger. Learn new spells and develop the spells you have acquired to be able to defeat enemies faster. Face various types of enemies and bosses who try to stop you. Collect coins to unlock new magic brooms, and don't forget to upgrade them to make them faster and more agile. Combine different magical spells, each associated with its own element, and find your winning strategy! There are two game modes available: Level Mode, where you can practice, explore new enemies, and, most importantly, conquer bosses; and Endless Mode, for those who want to challenge themselves against wave after wave of monsters. Good luck in the battle!

items.title: Cannon Clash
items.description: Cannon Clash is an action-packed island battle where you command a mighty cannon against rival pirates and enemy ships. Fire with precision, upgrade your arsenal, and defend your base in explosive showdowns. Outsmart and outshoot opponents to dominate the seas—because in this clash, only the sharpest aim survives.

items.title: Cannon Pirates Multiplayer
items.description: Cannon Pirates Multiplayer is a game where you, as a pirate, must reach the treasure island by jumping between platforms using your cannon. Shoot downwards to propel yourself, navigate between barrels and platforms, and avoid obstacles. Test your skills to find the hidden treasure!

items.title: Car Battle
items.description: Car Battle is a high-octane driving brawler where your war car is both weapon and shield. Take on enemies in single-player campaigns or face off in two-player duels, each clash spanning five intense stages. Upgrade your ride, sharpen your strategy, and unlock avatars to customize your fighter as you charge through escalating battles.

items.title: Carnage Battle Arena
items.description: Carnage Battle Arena is a sports car game where speed is just the beginning. With an extensive destruction model, you'll wreak havoc on the streets, transforming the environment as you race. Choose from 82 awesome cars across multiple game modes, including Battle Arena and Survival. Blocky, retro-styled graphics and game-changing power-ups add to the excitement as you race through dozens of unique maps.

items.title: Cars vs Skibidi Toilet
items.description: Cars vs Skibidi Toilet is an action-packed game where you engage in a thrilling battle against a monstrous Skibidi Toilet. Drive powerful cars armed with guns and unleash havoc on these invading creatures. Protect the city from their terror as you upgrade your vehicles, acquire new weapons, and become an unstoppable force against the toilet invasion. Explore the expansive city, encounter various types of Skibidi toilets, and save the residents from this unusual threat. Get ready for a wild mix of racing and shooting in this unique action game!

items.title: Castle Defender Saga
items.description: Castle Defender Saga is an endless castle defense game. Hold back hordes of determined enemies by placing defenses on your castle tower. Upgrade your units and level up to increase your health and firepower.

items.title: Cat and Granny
items.description: Cat and Granny is a chaotic first-person action where you play as a clever orange cat determined to outsmart the new black cat that Granny brought home! Cause havoc by knocking over flower pots, scattering objects, and scratching up furniture—all while making Granny believe the black cat is to blame.

items.title: Chakram Master
items.description: Chakram Master is a casual action game where precision and strategy are key! Aim your chakram, throw it to slice through enemies, and teleport to its location with a second click or when it stops bouncing. Move, dodge, and plan your limited throws carefully to clear out enemies and master the art of the chakram. Can you become the ultimate Chakram Master?

items.title: Clash of Ages
items.description: Clash of Ages is a strategic battle game where you lead your army from the Stone Age to the Modern Era. Begin with primitive tactics, conquer enemies, and earn coins to unlock advanced technologies. Progress through different eras, mastering new strategies and weapons to achieve ultimate victory in this epic clash.

items.title: Clash of Armor
items.description: Clash of Armor is an intense tank battle game. Deploy powerful tanks and destroy the enemy's turret to win the match.

items.title: Clash of Orcs
items.description: The orcs are having battles. Help your tribe survive by sending the best orc fighters to destroy the enemies!

items.title: Clash of Skulls
items.description: Clash of Skulls is a tower defense game to prevent enemies from destroying your base by deploying various types of skulls army. Level up your army to increase your damage. Start planning your attacks to take over your enemy's territory. Hire skeleton warriors with blades, spears, scythes, explosives, battering rams, and much more!

items.title: Clash of Tanks
items.description: Get ready for battle in this awesome RTS tank game. In Clash of Tanks, you become the army commander. You must deploy your tank carefully and think about where the enemy tanks are placed - don't get caught out or out-maneuvered.

items.title: Clash of Vikings
items.description: Clash of Vikings is a strategic battle game where you summon Vikings to fight a single enemy. Place your units tactically using your elixir points and try to destroy the enemy’s towers before they bring you down.

items.title: Cookie Delivery
items.description: Cookie Delivery is an action game about being a cookie deliveryman. This work is dangerous and difficult; in addition to obstacles on the road, you have to shoot back the animals who want to steal the cookies.

items.title: Cougar Simulator: Big Cats
items.description: Cougar Simulator: Big Cats is a simulation game that lets you step into the wild as a powerful cougar in a vast open-world adventure! Experience life as a big cat, hunting to feed yourself and your growing family, exploring beautiful landscapes, and upgrading your skills along the way. Customize your cougar’s appearance, choosing from different skins and even adding unique features like a magical glow or leopard-like spots.

items.title: Craft and Battle
items.description: Craft and Battle is a strategic battle game where you command an army, build a base, and gather resources to outmaneuver your enemies. Recruit specialized units, exchange prisoners for valuable assets, and capture the enemy general to weaken their forces. Every battle tests your tactics as you fight across diverse maps against an unpredictable enemy army.

items.title: Crazy Miners
items.description: Crazy Miners is a fast-paced digging battle where you race to find the diamond hidden deep in the map! Dig through the terrain, avoid traps, collect diamond fragments to unlock new skins and power-ups, throw TNT to clear your path (or sabotage others), and be the first to claim victory!

items.title: Crazy Vikings Life
items.description: Crazy Vikings Life is a wild cartoon-style strategy adventure where you command a fearless Viking clan on a quest for glory. Raid islands for loot, upgrade your scrappy raft into a mighty warship, and grow your base into a thriving Viking stronghold. Recruit warriors, train them for battle, and conquer the seas with humor and chaos.

items.title: Crown & Cannon
items.description: Crown & Cannon is a fast-paced 2D strategy game that challenges you to expand territory, command powerful weapons, and face off against dynamic AI on fully destructible terrain. With upgradeable units and tactical combat at its core, every battle demands sharp planning and bold moves as you carve your path to victory across shifting battlefields.

items.title: Cube Commander
items.description: Cube Commander is an action game where you must battle against zombies and protect the innocent. Venture through various terrains, from forests to swamps, and even ice and hellfire, pushing your limits to the edge of the world. Rally brave soldiers and unleash their skills to fight off hordes of evil spirits. Upgrade your warriors across five levels, utilize the dynamite catapult for explosive destruction, ride dragons to rain down bombs, and mount animals for swift movement. Gather gold in chests to prepare for the next level. Can you triumph over the forces of darkness?

items.title: Cursed Treasure 1.5
items.description: Cursed Treasure 1.5 is atower defense gamewhere you protect a stash of cursed jewels for an evil overlord. Stop the heroes from getting in and taking the corrupt gems by building defense towers and using magic.

items.title: Cursed Treasure 2
items.description: Cursed Treasure 2 is an action game, the long-awaited sequel toCursed Treasure, featuring improved gameplay and more levels! Defend your gems against enemies, champions, and bosses by building your towers strategically.

items.title: Cursed Treasure Level Pack
items.description: Level pack edition of the multi-races tower defense,Cursed Treasure. Protect your precious gems from being stolen.

items.title: CyberDino 3D
items.description: CyberDino 3D is an action-packed game where you control a futuristic cyber dinosaur in epic battles. Face off against waves of robots and monsters, enhance your equipment, and evolve your skills to dominate the battlefield. Embrace the challenge and prove you have what it takes to become the ultimate CyberDino champion.

items.title: CyberDino: T-Rex vs Robots
items.description: CyberDino: T-Rex vs Robots is a side-scrolling action game featuring futuristic cyber dinosaur battles. Fight against various monsters and robots, upgrade your gear, and become the ultimate CyberDino.

items.title: CyberShark
items.description: CyberShark is anaction gamewhere you fight underwater enemies and play as a shark. Upgrade your armor, create new weapons to become stronger, open loot boxes to get items, and play the sea battle mini-game to get more coins. Be prepared and beat all the enemies!

items.title: Daddy Rabbit
items.description: Daddy Rabbit is an action game where you control a daddy rabbit that must find and lead his scattered baby bunnies in underground mazes full of zombies.

items.title: Dark Lands
items.description: Dark Lands is a side-scrolling battle runner action game. Enter the Dark Lands and test your survival skills. Buy magnets, crystals, and immortality bonuses to defeat orcs and avoid death. You can spend gems on improved helmets, armor, boots, and gloves. Good luck!

items.title: Dead Seek
items.description: Dead Seek is a high-octane action shooter where every bullet counts against swarming undead. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, upgrade your gear, and adapt your tactics as you push through infected danger zones. With intense visuals and non-stop combat, this arcade thrill ride keeps your trigger finger—and your survival instincts—on edge.

items.title: Defend Your Castle
items.description: Defend your castle is a brilliant stickman defense game brought to you by XGenStudios who are also responsible for Stick Arena Dimensions. You own a castle and must defend it from attacking soldiers – you must pick up a soldier and drop them from the sky or throw them through the air to kill them. You must move quickly, click carefully and keep throwing your enemies away!

items.title: Defend Your Nuts
items.description: Defend Your Nuts is a defense game where you take on the role of a brave squirrel defending its precious acorns from hordes of evil monsters. Your goal is to protect your stash by strategically using various weapons and items at your disposal.

items.title: Desktop Tower Defense
items.description: Desktop Tower Defense is a classic tower defense game originally released in 2007 as a Flash game. It is made by Paul Preece and has been played 100s of millions of times. It's available here in HTML5 so that you can easily play it in your modern web browser.

items.title: Dice Wars
items.description: Dice Wars is an awesome game of conquest in which you must try to take over the world using dice. This game relies heavily on luck and the roll of the dice has to be on your side but you can also use your strategic mind to put the odds in your favor. You must try and conquer one territory at a time – you can attempt to conquer a territory by rolling the dice – if your roll is higher than your opponents roll your conquest is successful!

items.title: Dino Merge Wars
items.description: Dino Merge Wars is an action arcade game where you'll use a variety of powerful dinosaurs and humanoid characters on the battlefield to defeat fearsome dinos and emerge victorious. With a large selection of unique units, you'll have to set a strategize and decide which ones to send into battle. You can even merge your units to create even more powerful characters! You'll also be able to create your own dino riders, combining a dinosaur and a humanoid character. Thus, you'll be able to unleash devastating attacks and turn the tide of battle in your favor. Protect your Dino Egg and make sure it remains solid till your next battle! So what are you waiting for? Play Dino Merge Wars today and join the fight for survival!

items.title: Dino World: Merge & Fight
items.description: Dino World: Merge & Fight is a dinosaur battle game where you need to merge items and equip them to your dinosaur so it becomes more powerful. Battle in dino-on-dino showdowns and emerge victorious against your opponents!

items.title: Donut vs Donut
items.description: Donut vs Donut is a fast paced local multiplayer game featuring explosive donuts. It can be played with up to 4 players and the goal is to survive as the last donut in the ring. The game is made by Antti Salama, and if you like it you should consider buying the iOS version (see the button below). Good luck!

items.title: Doomr.io
items.description: Doomr.io is a 3D post-apocalyptic shooter where survival is a relentless battle. After a devastating nuclear war, few human survivors remain. Mutants roam the desolate world, posing constant threats. Armed with powerful weapons and gear, you must fight through hordes of mutants in a constant struggle for survival. Only the strongest and most resourceful will endure in this unforgiving wasteland. You can hang out in safe zones to gear up, trade, and rest. Head to Survival Mode for PVE and to earn gear and items.

items.title: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape
items.description: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape is a thrilling horror escape game where you are trapped in a nightmare clinic and need to get out of there. Gather essential items to unlock doors and escape the clutches of the deranged Doctor Psycho and his psychotic patients. Time is ticking, you only have 3 days to break free. Navigate terrifying space and uncover multiple escape routes while avoiding detection. Hide in cleverly hidden places and explore the place carefully avoiding deadly traps. Can you outwit the doctor and secure your asylum escape?

items.title: Dragon Simulator 3D
items.description: Dragon Simulator 3D is an action 3D animal simulator game in the same series asTiger SimulatorandRacoon Simulator. In this game, you are controlling a mighty dragon. Perform tasks and show your might to humans!

items.title: Dragons Merge: Battle Games
items.description: Dragons Merge: Battle Games is an action-packed strategy adventure where you fuse dragons and warriors to forge an unstoppable army. Combine identical units to unlock powerful transformations, then lead your team into real-time battles bursting with fiery clashes and tactical decisions. Every merge strengthens your path to becoming the ultimate Dragon Master in a world brimming with challenges.

items.title: Drone.io - AI Survivor
items.description: Drone.io – AI Survivor is a survival game where you command a powerful drone squad in a war against HackGPT’s AI uprising. Build your fleet, adapt fast, and crush relentless robotic threats in real-time tactical combat. You’ll need sharp reflexes, bold strategy, and relentless firepower to stop the apocalypse.

items.title: Duck Life: Battle (Demo)
items.description: The ducks that we know so well from the previous Duck Life games are back, but this time they're angrier. Forget racing, now it's time to battle! Prepare your ducks for battle by training them. Once you are ready, head to the battlefield and start fighting other ducks. Don't forget to buy equipment to help you.

items.title: Duck Life: Space
items.description: Duck Life: Space is a duckracing gamewith a galactic story and theme. An alien from outer space has nabbed your trophy, and you need to go on a quest through space to get it back! Enjoy a plethora of new mini-games and races along the way.

items.title: Duck Life
items.description: Duck Life is the first game in the Duck Life series. A tornado has struck your farm and destroyed everything. All that remains is a single duck egg. Train this duckling to peak athletic form so you can earn money to rebuild the farm.

items.title: Duck Life 2
items.description: Duck Life 2 is a duck racing game with various training levels to improve your athletic abilities. When you’ve trained enough, you enter a duck ‘quadrathlon’’ that puts your running, climbing, swimming, and flying skills to the test. Just another day in the life of a duck!

items.title: Duck Life 3
items.description: Duck Life 3 is a duck racing game featuring genetically modified ducks that evolve as you progress. Choose from one of four duck breeds and evolve as you complete each league. Like the previous game, training is essential to level up and improve your abilities.

items.title: Duck Life 4
items.description: Duck Life 4 is a duck racing game set after the ban ongenetically modified ducks. A year has passed since the ban on genetically modified ducks and now it’s up to you to defeat the world champion. Train your duck team to compete in six new locations around the world.

items.title: Dwarves: Glory, Death, and Loot
items.description: Dwarves: Glory, Death, and Loot is an action game where you lead an army of dwarves to victory through various battles. In this auto-battle RPG, you can decimate orcs, fight trolls, and battle dragons. You’ll discover glory, death, and humongous scores of loot!

items.title: Eagle Ride
items.description: Eagle Ride is a very challenging flying game in which you ride on a fast-flying eagle and need to avoid the trees. Thankfully it is a bright day with only a little bit of fog, so you can see very clearly. The eagle's flying speed is very high and you need to swiftly avoid the trees. If you hit one, you can always restart and try again. What is the longest time you can fly without crashing? Good luck!

items.title: Emerald and Amber
items.description: Help Emerald to get to Amber. Get stuck to the platforms to reach the goal!

items.title: Endless Siege
items.description: Endless Siege is a tower defense game where you survive endless waves of enemies. Add various defense towers in tactical locations to defeat the sieging enemies. Level the towers up and upgrade them to more powerful units. See how many waves you can survive before being overrun by a horde of warring beasts! This game is inspired by Anuto TD.

items.title: Endless Waves Survival
items.description: Endless Waves Survival is an adrenaline-fueled endless survival game. Fight a continuous onslaught of enemies and claim upgrades and new abilities as you level up. How long will you survive the next run?

items.title: Endurance: A Top-Down Sci-Fi Shooter
items.description: Endurance: A Top-Down Sci-Fi Shooter is a thrilling pixel game set on a mysterious starship. As a researcher on the ship Endurance, you must survive the zombie-like crew, unravel the eerie story, and rescue sane members to build your team. Packed with humor, horror, and nods to classic sci-fi films, this action-packed adventure awaits."

items.title: Epic Empire: Tower Defense
items.description: Epic Empire: Tower Defense is a thrilling strategy game where you command powerful heroes and towers to protect your kingdom from waves of evil forces. Embark on an epic adventure through vibrant worlds, from frozen kingdom, soaring magical kingdoms, dark underground tunnels, and enchanted florists. Face unique challenges worldwide as you battle to reclaim territories overrun by enemies.

items.title: Epic Sword Battle! Fight in Arena
items.description: Epic Sword Battle! Fight in Arena is a 3D action sword-fighting game where you're going to clash in chaotic arenas filled with action and ragdoll physics. Swing your blade and become the ultimate sword master. Use your reaction and accuracy to win every fight! The faster and more accurate your strikes, the higher your chances of becoming an arena champion!

items.title: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
items.description: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!

items.title: Escape from Zombies
items.description: Escape From Zombies is a thrilling zombie action game where your mission is to save as many people as possible. Navigate through exciting levels, armed with a variety of weapons and simple controls. In this transformed world, overrun by zombies, it's up to you to guide survivors to the airfield for their safety. Exercise caution with missiles and exploding barrels to prevent harm to the people you're rescuing. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!

items.title: Fantasy Madness
items.description: Fantasy Madness is a roguelike action-survival game set in a wildpunk World of Fantasy. Your goal is to stand against evil forces who want to destroy the natural order. Use a wide arsenal of arcane powers granted by beloved Mother Nature to smash down orcs from the Clan of Aluminum Helmets and other cunning foes.

items.title: Far Orion: New Worlds
items.description: Far Orion: New Worlds is an action game where you can command a team of brave heroes and lead your world to victory! The year is 2121, and technology has advanced far beyond the bounds of our wildest fantasies, but great progress also demands a great sacrifice. Use your strategy to set up your heroes and power card, beat all your opponents, and explore other worlds in search of treasure and limitless power!

items.title: Fight Arena Online
items.description: Fight Arena Online is a 3D multiplayer brawling game that allows you to combine punches and kicks to beat other opponents.

items.title: Fish Frenzy
items.description: Fish Frenzy is a charming adventure where you guide a tiny fish on a journey to grow stronger and faster. You must skillfully snack on smaller fish while cleverly dodging the predators lurking nearby. Upgrade your abilities and sharpen your instincts as you glide through colorful waters, facing new challenges with every swift movement.

items.title: Flip Bottle
items.description: Flip Bottle is a simple but challenging one-button game. Flip the bottle and make it jump from object to object to reach the final platform.

items.title: Fortress of the Wizard
items.description: Fortress of the Wizard is a magical defense adventure where you become a mighty sorcerer guarding your stronghold from relentless demon hordes. Harness an arsenal of devastating spells—fireballs, icy waves, swirling tornadoes, meteors, and more—to crush the invasion. Every battle tests your timing, strategy, and mastery of the arcane arts as you fight to protect your realm.

items.title: Fortzone Battle Royale
items.description: Fortzone Battle Royale is a high-stakes survival shooter where you face off against rivals in a massive, scenic battleground. Explore forests, cross rivers, and scavenge for resources as the action ramps up quickly. Outsmart enemies, collect powerful bonuses, and fight to be the last one standing in this fast-paced test of skill and strategy.

items.title: FPV War Kamikaze Drone
items.description: FPV War: Kamikaze Drone is a high-tech combat simulator that puts you in control of modern FPV drones across intense tactical missions. Experience the action through a realistic first-person view, enhanced by explosive visuals and immersive ragdoll physics, placing you right at the heart of the battlefield. Control combat FPV drones to destroy enemy vehicles and infantry using a mix of strategic planning, precision piloting, and a variety of powerful weapons. Every map challenges you to maximize your efficiency and secure victory.

items.title: Frontline Defense
items.description: Frontline Defense is a tower defense game where you must strategically position towers along the enemy's path to defend your territory. As with other tower defense games, your objective is to build and strategically position towers to annihilate waves of incoming enemies. By employing effective tower placement and utilizing unique abilities you can successfully defend your territory and emerge victorious. Prepare for an exciting challenge as you navigate through various levels and devise strategies to defeat your adversaries!

items.title: Rage Fruits Tower Defense
items.description: Rage Fruits Tower Defense is an innovative and humorous tower defense game with a unique blend of mechanics and quirky visuals. Combines backpack synthesis, roguelike elements, and tower defense, creating an engaging and fresh gameplay experience.

items.title: Funny Battle Simulator
items.description: Funny Battle Simulator is an action game where you must use your strategy to set up your army. Take command over infantry and archers. Send Cyclops and Spartans into battle. Watch your grenadiers throw grenades at enemies. Control the great Zeus and throw lightning. Crush all enemies. Show your tactical skills.

items.title: Funny Battle Simulator 2
items.description: Funny Battle Simulator 2 is a battle simulation game where you tactically place an army and take them into battle. Add a variety of units to fight for your side, from cavemen to bears with miniguns.

items.title: Funny Blade & Magic
items.description: Funny Blade & Magic is an action game where you step into a goofy world seeking to reclaim the throne of the goblin king after your uncle betrayed you. Use magical abilities and powerful weapons like swords, axes, and hammers to fight close-quarters with unique bosses and enemies. Are you ready to become the funniest and strongest goblin?

items.title: Furry Road
items.description: Furry Road is a fierce combat racing game where your car becomes a weapon in a post-apocalyptic showdown. Build a deadly war cart, equip rocket launchers, and blast through enemies, mutant creatures, and brutal bosses. Outspeed rivals, upgrade your ride, and prove you have the reflexes and grit to survive this relentless road war.

items.title: Fury Wars - Online Shooter
items.description: Fury Wars - Online Shooter is a wild third-person online shooter where chaos, absurd humor, and explosive action collide. Unleash a ridiculous arsenal—from flaming tridents to explosive fish—while battling as hilariously twisted hero parodies. Dive into Escort Mode, unleash ultimate abilities, and turn every match into a frantic, cartoon-style showdown packed with trashy, unpredictable fun.

items.title: Galaxy Control: 3D Strategy
items.description: Galaxy Control: 3D Strategy is a 3D space strategy game that puts you in command of epic battles and interstellar expansion. Build your base, defend your territory, and engage in thrilling conflicts with other players. With its stunning visuals and dynamic gameplay, every decision you make shapes the galaxy's future. Test your strategic skills and conquer the stars!

items.title: Gangsters
items.description: Gangsters is a pixelated shooting mayhem in which the players takes control of a gang. The goal of the game is to defend your turf against rival gangs. The graphics are retro and pixelated but the gameplay is exciting, intense and bloody. You can use a different weapons such as pistols and machine guns to fight the rival gangs.

items.title: Geometry: Open World
items.description: Geometry: Open World is a fast-paced 2D action game where players control a ship navigating through treacherous obstacles, battling a variety of enemies, and ultimately facing off against formidable bosses. The game’s dynamic and vibrant open world, combined with strategic upgrades and powerful abilities, allows you to chart your course to victory! Can you defeat the bosses, conquer the obstacles, and become the best player in this open-world geometry action game?

items.title: Getaway Shootout
items.description: Getaway Shooter is a chaotictwo-player gamewhere you race three others to the finish line. Your moves are limited, and you can only move by jumping left or right, making the race tricky! Pick up guns and other weapons along the way to use against the others. May the best player win!

items.title: Ghetto Fighter
items.description: Ghetto Fighter is a fast-paced action game where you take control of the streets and battle rival thugs. You’ll chase down vehicles, unlock new rides, and grow your gang to rule the region. With dynamic action, bold visuals, and smooth controls, every moment pushes you to take charge and rise through the ranks.

items.title: Ghost Walker
items.description: Ghost Walker is an action game about a ninja who went on a hunt for reputable bandit leaders. This game will amaze you with cool ninja controls in slow Motion and dynamism. Your main task is to destroy the bosses. This is a game in which you will fully feel like an unsurpassed, elusive, super dexterous, and strong master of melee weapons. Try to experience this incredible feeling of elusiveness yourself, defeat all the bandits without a single scratch, and become a legend.

items.title: Gladiator: True Story
items.description: Gladiator: True Story is a gladiator arena survival game where you control Bruticus, the destroyer of worlds. This is the story of how you became the greatest gladiator of all time. Based on historical facts. Hack n' slash your way through waves of ultimate fighters and champions. Level up your armor and weapons to do even more damage in this bloody battle arena!

items.title: Gladiator Fights
items.description: Gladiator Fights is an action fighting game that transports you back to the blood-soaked sands of ancient Rome, where every battle is a fight for survival and glory. As you step into the digitalized Colosseum, you'll feel like a true gladiator, immersed in the brutal world of hand-to-hand combat. Battle your way through fierce arenas, squaring off against formidable foes who will push your strength and strategy to the limit. Each fight is a raw test of skill, where victory means honor and defeat could be your last breath.

items.title: Goblin Punk Tower Defense
items.description: Goblin Punk Tower Defense is a fast-paced strategy game where you battle waves of mischievous goblins. Use futuristic towers to fend off relentless enemies, strategically placing and upgrading defenses to alter their paths. Each wave grows stronger, pushing your tactical skills to the limit. Build the ultimate defense and see how long you can survive the invasion!

items.title: Gravity Arena Shooter
items.description: Gravity Arena Shooter is an action shooter game where the laws of gravity bend to your will! Engage in thrilling team battles where each player possesses the unique ability to manipulate gravity, giving you unparalleled freedom of movement and strategic advantage. With dynamic conflicts and heart-pounding action, immerse yourself in a gravity-defying world where victory is within your grasp. Bend the laws, control the battle, and dominate the arena like never before!

items.title: Grimdark Survivors
items.description: Grimdark Survivors is an adrenaline-pumping roguelite game where you have to survive an alien attack. Choose your hero, arm yourself, and prepare to face the relentless darkness. Each hero offers a unique playing style so that each game will feel fresh and exciting. There are many choices of weapons to choose such as precision assault rifles to flamethrowers! Experiment, strategize, and find the perfect weapon that suits your style to conquer the darkness. You will not only face waves of enemies but also tough bosses that will test your braveness. Use the skills and equipment you acquire to achieve victory.

items.title: Guardians of the Kingdom
items.description: Guardians of the Kingdom is an action-packed fantasy game that takes you on an epic journey to defend the realm from the dragon army of eternity. Strategically deploy your heroes in this Tower Defense adventure, showcasing your tactical brilliance to claim victory. Upgrade your heroes to bolster their strength and face waves of relentless enemies. Unite identical heroes to enhance their powers, and wield the power to control the battlefield. Prepare for an immersive and thrilling battle to safeguard the Kingdom!

items.title: Halloween Chainsaw Massacre
items.description: Halloween Chainsaw Massacre is an action game where the city was filled with magical monster pumpkins. Use your chainsaw and destroy all enemies! Saw them apart. Make a long-range throw at the enemy and tear him apart. Use a circular attack and take down all the pumpkins around. Free the city and become a hero!

items.title: Haunted School
items.description: Haunted School is a horror survival game where you search a school for the tools required to exorcise a demonic child. Explore the map looking for clues and supplies. How long will you survive the Haunted School?

items.title: Haunted School 2
items.description: Haunted School 2 is ahorror gameset ten years after the events in the firstHaunted School. Return once more to the eerie abandoned school to perform another exorcism.

items.title: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack
items.description: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack is a 2D action game where you play as Hiro, a ninja trained by master Daiki and his daughter Hana in a secret ninja village. When the vampire king Dakura discovers the village, he kidnaps Hana and leaves his army of corrupted ninjas, giants, dragons, and witches to guard her. Despite the formidable foes, Hiro is determined to rescue Hana. Why did Dakura take Hana? No one knows. Help Hiro reach the highest tower and rescue his beloved now!

items.title: Hero Survivors
items.description: Hero Survivors is an action-roguelike game where you'll face countless waves of menacing spirits in intense battles reminiscent of Vampire Survivors. Choose from three distinct heroes, each with their unique traits, and embark on a journey filled with thrilling adventures and epic challenges. Will you emerge victorious against the spirits, or will you fall in battle like so many before you? The fate of the world hangs in the balance—choose wisely, hero!

items.title: Herochero: Enemy Slayer
items.description: Herochero: Enemy Slayer is a thrilling RPG tower defense game where you, as the hero, defend your realm from waves of enemies. Strategically manage tower placement while supplying them with unique ammo types like fire and ice to keep the defense strong. Actively control your hero to repel invaders and protect your base!

items.title: Hex Color Idle
items.description: Hex Color Idle is a unique idle game in which you must work to develop a range of hexadecimal colors. With over 16,000 different colors to make this game has endless possibilities and will keep you entertained for hours. You must use the 5 paint squares to create a mix of different colors – depending on the mix you have, this will affect your chances of creating a new color.

items.title: Hook Arena
items.description: Hook Arena is an action-packed game where you battle the opponents on opposite sides of a river using unique hook weapons. Your objective is to hook enemies to eliminate them one by one, pull in beneficial rune bottles, or escape by hooking yourself to a physical support like a pole. Before the match, you can choose your team's color, upgrade your character, and change their skin and weapon. In the treasure menu, you can hack and open chests with both a chest and a key. Who knows what secrets they hold, but all items will be placed in your inventory. Fight in matches, earn trophies, and climb the leaderboard rankings. Good luck in the battle!

items.title: Hook & Slice
items.description: Hook & Slice is a thrilling physics-driven action game where you use a grappling hook to swing and take down enemies with precision. Unlock powerful weapons like katanas and axes to enhance your slicing skills. Embrace the chaotic ragdoll combat as you master the art of swift and strategic attacks in a unique samurai adventure.

items.title: Horror Nights Story
items.description: Do you ever feel like there are creatures lurking just behind you? Waiting to grab you? In Horror Nights Story this comes true! You must dig down and try to escape from the evil creatures that are following you.

items.title: Horseback Survival
items.description: Horseback Survival is a 2D side-scrolling game where you must run and survive from the zombies attack while you're horse riding. You can play the Level mode or Free Run mode which unlocks after level 5. Upgrade your weapon and purchase different hairstyles and hats in the Shop. Complete the task on your way to reach the well. Good luck!

items.title: Hot Lava Floor
items.description: Hot Lava Floor is a parkour game that will remind you back to your childhood imagination. Run and jump onto various objects around you, but be careful, do not let your guard down or you will be drowning in the hot lava! Collect cash along the way to buy chests in the Lava Shop. Try to find keys while you do the parkour to be able to unlock new levels. Play it by yourself or even with your friends in multiplayer mode.

items.title: Hunter Hitman
items.description: Hunter Hitman is an action game where you play as a hitman armed with just a knife and your skills in the assassination. Sneak up on your enemies and eliminate them all. Kill multiple targets in a short time, and you will get a combo. Earn coins and unlock cards to obtain different character skins. Come back daily to collect daily rewards. Uncover loot boxes that yield cards. Assemble 3 of the same cards to upgrade your characters.

items.title: Hyper Knight
items.description: Hyper Knight is an exciting and action-packed gaming experience where players can immerse themselves in a post-apocalyptic world filled with battles and danger. The game's features, including equipment upgrades, magical abilities, and companion recruitment, provide depth and strategic elements to keep players engaged. The endless adventure aspect ensures that players will always have new challenges to face, and epic boss battles add an extra layer of intensity. So, don your armor, grab your sword, and embark on this epic quest in "Hyper Knight" to become humanity's hero in its darkest hour.

items.title: Hyperspace: Quantum Fracture
items.description: Hyperspace: Quantum Fracture is a sci-fi shoot 'em up blending roguelike progression, bullet hell intensity, and auto-shooter action. You are on a thrilling journey through deep space, facing relentless enemy swarms. Test your survival skills in the vast unknown.

items.title: Idle Superpowers
items.description: Idle Superpowers is a roguelike idle RPG in which you become a hero with various superpowers to defeat your countless enemies!

items.title: Immortal: Dark Slayer
items.description: Immortal: Dark Slayer is a top-down action RPG that puts you in the armor of a Fallen Knight, battling to purge the realm of demons, the undead, and creeping chaos. Drawing inspiration from the punishing combat of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, it delivers the same gritty challenge, reimagined with a top-down perspective and streamlined controls. Whether you're a seasoned RPG veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this dark fantasy adventure offers a thrilling, accessible experience.

items.title: Infected Days
items.description: Infected Days is an action game where hordes of infected zombies are coming and you become the last home for protection. Destroy waves of zombies supported by tons of boosts, upgrades, perks, and other bonuses and see how far you can go.

items.title: Infinite Heroes
items.description: Infinite Heroes is a board card game where you must join the magical world of adventure. Challenge the monster army and defeat the demon. Simple at first glance, the game will present you with complex challenges. Creatures, artifacts, portals, spells, and heroes. Play as a tireless adventurer, a powerful magician, a great warlock, or any of the eight heroes! Get loot and treasure to win. As you progress, the strength of your opponents will also grow, and to win, you need to think through every step.

items.title: Infinite Launch
items.description: Infinite Launch is an action game where you can explore space and colonize planets. Create satellites so you can collect stars and use them to get a new planet. Fight with the aliens and conquer the universe!

items.title: Iron Crusher
items.description: Iron Crusher is an action-packed game where Earth's fate rests on a heroic cat. Play as this fearless feline, shooting down alien invaders and upgrading your abilities with powerful items. Navigate through intense battles, protect the planet, and become the ultimate defender in this thrilling adventure.

items.title: Iron Towers Alliance
items.description: Iron Towers Alliance is a thrilling action defense PvP strategy game where you build and defend your tower against players worldwide. Fortify your structure, install powerful weapons, and lead your squad in battles. Team up for assaults, climb the rankings and earn rewards. Unlock achievements, collect parts, and upgrade your units to dominate the battlefield!

items.title: Jacksmith
items.description: Jacksmith is a crafting game where you forge weapons for soldiers and join them on the battlefield as they slay monsters. Build the perfect weapons to see the soldiers into battle and give them the greatest chance of success!

items.title: Janissary Battles
items.description: Janissary Battles is a compilation of 8 retro-pixel games that were part of the popular Janissary series. Hit the play button to play Arrow, Axe, Sword, Mace, Arena, Spear, Catapult and Gun levels, each with a score of 5 to achieve. Keep track of your win count in the "Scoreboard" section located at the corner of your screen in the main menu. This game is exclusively available for 2 players.

items.title: Jet Fighter Airplane Racing
items.description: Jet Fighter Airplane Racing is an action airplane game where you can complete many different missions, improve your flying skills, and become a true professional in piloting! There are many exclusive airplanes available, such as MiG-21 “Fishbed", McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II, MiG-29 “Fulcrum”, F-16 Fighting Falcon, MiG-31 BM “Foxhound”, F-22 Raptor, SU-35 “Flanker-E”, SU-47 "Firkin", SU-57. Become a skilled fighter pilot in the sky and get lots of adrenaline. Avoid the fly traffic in jet-flying race games! Are you ready for a traffic airplane adventure? Fasten your seatbelt and prepare to fly!

items.title: Sniper Challenge
items.description: Sniper Challenge is a high-stakes shooting game where you play as a sniper tasked with eliminating contestants before they complete intense trials. Use sharp aim to line up each shot and prevent anyone from reaching the ultimate prize. With smooth controls and detailed 3D graphics, every shot counts in this mission-driven experience.

items.title: Kill-BOI 9000
items.description: Kill-BOI 9000 is an action game where you must bring hearts to the robot, Kill-BOI, so you can upgrade and make the robot even stronger. You can play this game solo or play with your friend locally. Get ready and beat the monsters out of your way!

items.title: Kill The Spartan
items.description: Kill The Spartan is a game where you choose ways how the Spartan will die.

items.title: Kings Clash
items.description: Kings Clash is an action game where you must create your own army by merging minions. Create strong heroes and place them in the area to win the war. Try to be the most powerful player!

items.title: Krampus
items.description: Krampus is a horror game to put all the items on the plates, activate the spell, and trap Krampus! Can you defeat him?

items.title: Last Play: Ragdoll Sandbox
items.description: Last Play: Ragdoll Sandbox is an action sandbox universe where your creativity takes center stage. Build stunning structures, pilot powerful mechs, and populate your world with lively ragdolls. Enjoy thrilling destruction, uncover quirky melon-themed mini-games, and design imaginative playgrounds. With tools to create and share your own games, the possibilities are endless. What will you create?

items.title: Lime Playground Sandbox
items.description: Lime Playground Sandbox is an action game where you must kill all the zombies. This game offers a unique combination of machine gun shooting, car driving, and destruction. There are three game modes you can play: Sandbox Mode, where you can place any objects you want and play with your imagination. Campaign Mode, where you must complete all the levels and collect 3 lemons at each level. Survival Mode, where you must survive as long as possible from the hordes of zombies. Have fun as you like!

items.title: Little Big Fighters
items.description: Little Big Fighters is an action survival game where you'll embark on a thrilling journey to show the world who truly reigns supreme in the arena of combat. Defeat your opponents, grow stronger with each victory, and collect valuable resources to bolster your power and dominance. Are you ready to prove yourself as the ultimate fighter in an epic battle for survival?

items.title: Little Robot
items.description: Little Robot is a robot action game where you must destroy your enemies to take control of them and make them fight for you!

items.title: Loot Party
items.description: Loot Party is an action game that introduces a new party mechanic to enhance your gameplay experience. In this game, you embark on a thrilling and perilous journey, gathering a party of brave heroes to accompany you.

items.title: Mad Royale Tactics
items.description: Mad Royale Tactics is a turn-based battle royale where strategy and precision decide your fate. Command a mini tank, plan each move carefully, and unleash tactical shots to outsmart opponents. Use the terrain to gain the upper hand—knock enemies off platforms, deflect incoming fire, or land mid-air hits. Outsmart, outmaneuver, and be the last tank rolling!

items.title: Magic Hands
items.description: Magic Hands is a funcasual gamewhere you cast spells on the approaching enemies. Use different key combos tocreate magic spellsand clear the enemies from each level!

items.title: Magic Tower: Cards War
items.description: Magic Tower: Cards War is a strategic battle game where you must protect the princess so she doesn't get killed by the enemies. Get a deck of fighters and place them in the correct position to win. Combine two of the same units and get a mega-unit! There are also buffers or bonuses to strengthen your troops. Use your tactical skills because each decision gets you closer to victory. Will you successfully protect the princess?

items.title: Mechs Rumble Blitz
items.description: Mechs Rumble Blitz is an adrenaline-pumping action battle arena game that puts you in the pilot seat of a customizable robot! Prepare to test your skills, strategy, and reflexes in a dynamic arena filled with traps, obstacles, and waves of powerful enemies. Upgrade, customize, and fight to prove you’re the best mech pilot in the world!

items.title: Medieval Battle 2P
items.description: Medieval Battle 2P is a war strategy game with a medieval theme that you can play by yourself or with your friend. Place your powerful soldiers and set your battle strategy to win the war.

items.title: Meme Survivors: Backrooms
items.description: Meme Survivors: Backrooms is a chaotic roguelite romp where internet legends battle for survival in a bizarre, hazard-filled maze. Choose your meme hero—from tearful Banana Cat to thunderous Pop Cat—and unleash wild abilities against waves of absurd foes. Every run is unpredictable, packed with upgrades, surprises, and unfiltered internet absurdity.

items.title: Merge Age Warriors
items.description: Merge Age Warriors is a strategy game where you command armies across three epic eras. Lead cavemen in the Stone Age, knights in the Medieval Age, and bold scientists in the Modern Age. As you merge and strengthen your forces, you’ll discover creative ways to outwit enemies and shape the course of legendary battles.

items.title: Merge Army
items.description: Merge Army is a merge battle game where you build up a mighty army for battle. Merge your units to create stronger fighters and take them into the arena. Earn gold for your victories and prepare your military for more brutal battles.

items.title: Merge Cannon: Chicken Defense
items.description: Merge Cannon: Chicken Defense is an action defense and merge game where you protect your castle against an army of chickens. Can you hold back continuous waves of chickens while maintaining defenses?

items.title: Merge Defense
items.description: Merge Defense is an action-strategy game that melds merging mechanics with intense battles against unrelenting adversaries. As humanity's last bastion, you must merge, adapt, and battle to safeguard your world from encroaching darkness. Engage in high-speed, skill-driven combat against hordes of foes. Defending your realm requires not just brawn but also cunning strategy. Strategically plan your merges to counter various enemy types and their unique abilities.

items.title: Merge Master Tanks: Tank Wars
items.description: Merge Master Tanks: Tank Wars is a merge 2D tank game that immerses you in a world of authentic cartoon-style tanks. Merge identical tanks, leading them into thrilling battles against formidable foes and challenging bosses. Experience the excitement of tank warfare like never before in this unique gaming adventure.

items.title: Merge War
items.description: Merge War is a blend of strategy and action, where you can combine slimes, dragons, and monster pets to forge a powerful legion. Compete in the arena against other merge experts. Craft a formidable army by merging, conquering monsters, and challenging super dragons. Unlock rare cards, strategize your deck, and upgrade your legion to claim victory. This game offers thrilling gameplay for both casual and strategic players. Unleash your merging skills, create your legion, and seize the title of ultimate merge master!

items.title: Mini Jumps
items.description: Mini Jumps is a one-button jumping game to jump over the platforms to reach the goal.

items.title: Modern Cannon Strike
items.description: Modern Cannon Strike is an action game in which you must launch a missile to destroy your enemy. Aim at the specific location, and then fire! You can easily aim for your enemies by looking at the red target on the tablet and then timing your shots. Enjoy the game, and get ready for the battle!

items.title: Monster Box
items.description: Monster Box is acasual gamewhere you capture monsters in capsules and use them to defend yourself! Collect monsters for battles, accept challenges from other trainers, and reward your monsters with play and treats. Create your best team ever!

items.title: Monster Duel
items.description: Monster Duel is a competition of monsters where you must win the battle to get the body parts of your opponent. Merge the best body parts to become fearsome, unlock combinations of overpowering spells, fight more incredible bosses, and become the most feared animal in the world!

items.title: Monster Life
items.description: Monster Life is an action game where you choose and adopt a monster, and fight in epic battles! Can you beat the big boss?

items.title: Monster School Herobrine Siren Head
items.description: Monster School Herobrine Siren Head is an action game where you need to kill all of these zombies. Choose your character to play between the girl or Herobrine. You can also choose which world you want to play, Zombies at School or Siren Head in the City Town. Collect lucky boxes so you can place traps for all of these monsters. So, what are you waiting for? Equip your weapon and start the action!

items.title: Monsters Tactics
items.description: Monsters Tactics is an arena battle game where you choose the best monster combinations to defeat your adversary!

items.title: Mouse Warriors
items.description: Mouse Warriors is a 2D roguelike game where you must upgrade yourself to be much stronger to fight all the monsters in the arena. Fight waves of monsters with your mouse movement. Collect coins and use them to purchase upgrades, characters, and weapons. Be more powerful, defeat bosses, and conquer all the levels!

items.title: Mr. Dude: King of the Hill
items.description: Mr. Dude: King of the Hill is an action game where you play the famous criminal, Mr. Dude. You're escaping from the cops and end up on the top of a mountain, where residents are living and ready to hand you over to the police. Knock out and throw these residents off the cliff and conquer the mountain! There are different objects that you can use as a weapon, throw and swing at your opponents. Grab some food to refill your health bar. With various enemies and interactive ragdoll characters, this game will bring a lot of fun to you!

items.title: Mr. Throw
items.description: Mr. Throw is an arcade game where you must defeat your opponent by throwing objects at him. Aim and throw all your objects at the enemy to beat him. Even a cute teddy bear can be a deadly weapon! Calculate the force and aim it appropriately. Achieve your victory in this dangerous object-throwing battle!

items.title: Mutant Escape
items.description: Mutant Escape is an action game where you play as a mutant trying to escape a top-secret laboratory. Choose three powers and use them to escape this mutant prison!

items.title: Mutant Fighting Cup
items.description: Mutant Fighting Cup is a 2D fighting game in which you will fight newly generated mutant animals in a tournament to win the cup. You can completely create new mutant species, mix the different gene strands together like a mad scientist to create a new species of animal. Your animal must be strong and fierce to be able to defeat all others in the tournament ahead.

items.title: Mutant Idle
items.description: Mutant Idle is an action game where you play as a professor who creates mutants to fight against the army that has a mutant captive. Defeat them to set the mutants free! The rescued mutants will then fight alongside you, and you can strengthen them by combining their DNA using machines you invented. With more mutants, you can increase the number of slots and create new hybrid mutants. Discover different types of mutants and their unique attack animations as you progress through the game. Unlock new slots to join the battle with more mutants and experience the excitement of creating new species.

items.title: Night Watchman
items.description: Night Watchman is ahorror gamewithjump scareswhere you keep watch in the dark. It’s likeHide N Seek, but with scary characters and dangerous dolls that look similar to characters from Four Nights At Freddy's . Cover your eyes and wait to attack - but don’t wait too long!

items.title: Ninja Escape
items.description: Ninja Escape is an action ninja game where you dodge obstacles and battle samurai. Jump, slide, and dash through each level and tackle all obstacles to proceed to the next level. Unlock new ninja skills as you progress.

items.title: Ninja Hands
items.description: Ninja Hands is a casual arcade game where you play as a ninja. Use expert hand movements to deliver epic ninja powers. Learn new combos, upgrade your skills, and customize your ninja in Ninja Hands.

items.title: Ninja Hands 2
items.description: Ninja Hands 2 is an action-packed ninja game where you unleash your ninja warrior skills. Generate various abilities and unleash epic combos to combat your foes. Employ strategic thinking to craft potent spells that obliterate enemies and secure victory. Harness your ninja prowess and conquer the challenges that lie ahead!

items.title: Ninja Parkour Multiplayer
items.description: Ninja Parkour Multiplayer is a 2D game where your objective is to avoid obstacles along your path to the end of the course. Quick movements and precision jumps will get you far. Hesitation will get you straight back to the beginning.

items.title: Noob and Zombies
items.description: Noob and Zombies is a 2D survival action game where your only way out is to fix your car and fight your way through waves of the undead. Trapped in a zombie-infested city, you’ll need to repair broken vehicles while fending off relentless hordes. Kill zombies, upgrade your gear, and survive long enough to make your escape.

items.title: Noob Tower Defense
items.description: Noob Tower defense is an action game where you build towers and traps for zombie monsters. Get coins after killing zombies and upgrade heroes to take revenge!

items.title: Noob vs Cops
items.description: Noob vs Cops is an exhilarating survival game where you take on the role of Noob and must escape the relentless pursuit of zombie cops. Navigate your boat, dodge obstacles, and take down zombie cops. Collect points by gathering fish and crabs. Buy new weapons and upgrade your boat. With each thrilling mission, outsmart the zombie cops and become the ultimate pirate with your formidable pirate ship!

items.title: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse
items.description: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse is an exciting zombie game with a fun storyline that awaits you. Go through level after level. Noob lives quietly in his small house in the forest, suddenly zombies attacked the world of blocks! Whole hordes of zombies want to destroy everything in their path. Help Noob and Pro to end them. Kill zombies, and destroy everything in your path. Survive in this challenging zombie!

items.title: Noob: Zombie Prison Escape
items.description: Noob: Zombie Prison Escape is an action platforming game inspired by the style of Minecraft. Your mission is to help Noob escape from a zombie-infested prison by finding keys, coins, solving puzzles, avoiding traps, and using parkour skills to navigate platforms. Along the way, you'll need to shoot down monsters with a crossbow, complete tasks involving torches, and face various challenges in 10 different levels. Fans of the Noob series and Minecraft-style gameplay will find this game engaging as it features beloved characters and a variety of puzzles and adventures to solve.

items.title: North War
